description: Developing Local Capacity for the Achievement of the MDGs (DeLCap)

subproject.description: (a) Capacities of the local governments, CSOs and private sector developed to create enabling environment for the LED interventions at regional and selected locality levels in 4 big Regions (Level-1); and (b) Employment and self-employment opportunities enhanced for the youth, women and vulnerable groups, through investments and targeted economic interventions, for the promotion of pro-poor economic growth and sustainable livelihoods, in selected localities in 4 big Regions (Level-2). Moreover the four Emerging Regional states will be supported to build their instituinal capcity for service delivery.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: DELCAP

title: DELCAP(Developing Local Capacity for Achievment of MDGs)
